item.title: 爱尔兰银行将退出美国杠杆融资市场
item.description: 爱尔兰银行集团正退出美国杠杆收购融资市场，因私人信贷业务已开始蚕食传统银行历来收取的费用。【原文：Bank of Ireland Group Plc is withdrawing from the US market for leveraged acquisition financings as private credit has started to chip away at fees historically collected by traditional banks.】

item.title: 核聚变初创企业宣称在新西兰试验中取得重大突破
item.description:
创始人拉图·马泰拉坚信，凭借其更经济的反应堆设计，OpenStar能够超越竞争对手。【原文：

Founder Ratu Mataira is convinced OpenStar can outpace rivals with its cheaper reactor design.

】

item.title: 罗宾汉10亿美元基金力推上市前股票成为下一个投资热潮
item.description: 罗宾汉金融公司正计划通过首次公开募股（IPO）募集10亿美元，该封闭式基金旨在为美国散户投资者提供接触私营企业的渠道。这家与迷因股密切相关的经纪公司正追逐着最新的市场狂热。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is seeking to raise $1 billion in an initial public offering of a closed-end fund designed to give US retail investors access to private companies, as the brokerage associated with meme stocks chases the latest frenzy.】

item.title: 若资金到位，纽约-新泽西门户隧道工程将于下周重启
item.description: 据知情人士透露，若特朗普政府此前冻结的2.05亿美元联邦拨款能全额到位，耗资160亿美元的哈德逊河底铁路隧道工程将于下周重启施工。【原文：Construction work on a $16 billion rail tunnel under the Hudson River will restart as soon as next week if the project receives the full $205 million of federal funding that the Trump administration halted, according to people familiar with the process.】

item.title: 戴利称美联储官员应警惕人工智能影响的迹象
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽·戴利表示，尽管目前尚无太多迹象表明人工智能正在从根本上改变美国经济，但政策制定者必须对新技术将产生影响的征兆保持开放态度。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said that while there isn’t much indication yet that artificial intelligence is fundamentally changing the US economy, policymakers must be open to signs that the new technology will have an impact.】

item.title: 散户投资者可通过新基金投资SpaceX和Anthropic
item.description: Powerlaw Corp.——这家持有安杜里尔工业公司、SpaceX、OpenAI和Anthropic PBC股权的基金——正申请在纽约出售股份，让散户投资者有机会从人工智能、国防和航天领域的一些最大私营企业中获利。【原文：Powerlaw Corp., a fund that owns stakes in Anduril Industries Inc., SpaceX, OpenAI and Anthropic PBC, is filing to sell shares in New York, giving retail investors a shot at profiting from some of the biggest private companies in artificial intelligence, defense and space.】

item.title: 黑石集团被曝考虑最早于周二重新提交IPO申请
item.description: 知情人士透露，Liftoff Mobile公司正考虑最早于本周二提交新的首次公开募股（IPO）申请，此前该公司已撤回了之前的注册申请。【原文：Liftoff Mobile Inc. is considering submitting a new IPO filing as soon as Tuesday, according to people familiar with the matter, after withdrawing its previous registration.】

item.title: 凯茜·伍德的ARKK基金再遭重创，自新冠疫情以来已下跌50%
item.description: 在凯茜·伍德成为疫情时期投资狂热的代言人多年后，其旗舰基金正迎来艰难的里程碑时刻。【原文：Years after Cathie Wood became the face of pandemic-era investing euphoria, her flagship fund is marking a difficult milestone.】

item.title: 私营软件公司提前发布财报以安抚人工智能领域的神经
item.description: 包括迈克菲在内的一些软件公司提前公布了财报，试图向贷款方证明其具备抵御人工智能冲击的能力。【原文：A handful of software firms including McAfee have released their earnings ahead of schedule in a bid to convince lenders of their resilience to disruption from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉释放引发警报的石油专家
item.description: 委内瑞拉在拘留四天后释放了一名拥有美国国籍的知名石油顾问。此案凸显了该国持续存在的风险，正值华盛顿支持的加拉加斯政府试图振兴石油产业之际。【原文：Venezuela has released a prominent oil consultant who also has US citizenship after four days in detention, a case that highlights the country’s persistent risks as the Washington-backed administration in Caracas seeks to revive the petroleum industry.】

item.title: 陷入困境的Sheertex公司所有者在魁北克一家袜业公司中找到买家
item.description: 加拿大企业SRTX公司正处于困境之中，该公司以生产名为Sheertex的弹性连裤袜而闻名。在宣布战略审查数月后，该公司又在蒙特利尔地区找到另一家服装企业将其收购。【原文：SRTX Inc., the struggling Canadian company known for making resilient pantyhose called Sheertex, found another apparel business in the Montreal region to buy it, months after announcing a strategic review.】

item.title: ION创始人称市场对人工智能的担忧是"恐慌性反应"
item.description: ION集团创始人安德烈亚·皮尼亚塔罗表示，在软件公司市值近期蒸发逾2万亿美元后，投资者正在惩罚错误的企业。【原文：ION Group’s founder Andrea Pignataro said investors are punishing the wrong companies after more than $2 trillion was wiped off the value of software firms in recent weeks.】

item.title: 巴克莱称"机器人十年"将催生万亿市场
item.description: 据巴克莱分析师团队预测，到2035年，人工智能驱动的机器人和自主机器市场有望膨胀至万亿美元规模，较当前市场规模扩大数个数量级。【原文：The market for AI-powered robots and autonomous machines has the potential to balloon into a trillion-dollar opportunity by 2035, orders of magnitude bigger than it is now, according to a team of Barclays analysts.】

item.title: 赫斯特公司创纪录盈利，归功于惠誉债券评级机构实力
item.description: 赫斯特通讯公司——这家非公开上市的媒体与服务企业——在旗下债券评级机构惠誉集团的带动下，2025年创下利润新高。【原文：Hearst Communications Inc., the closely held media and services company, reported record profit for 2025, led by its bond-rating agency Fitch Group.】

item.title: 洛杉矶港进口量骤降，特朗普关税扰乱贸易流
item.description: 洛杉矶港1月份集装箱吞吐量下降12%，进出口量较去年同期疲软。去年此时，货主们为应对特朗普总统的关税政策而争相运输货物。【原文：Total container traffic though the Port of Los Angeles dropped 12% in January as exports and imports weakened from a year earlier, when shippers rushed to move freight in anticipation of President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: Anthropic称新型AI模型在计算机使用方面表现更优
item.description: 人类中心论PBC公司即将发布一款新型人工智能模型，旨在更高效地利用计算机执行日益复杂的任务，延续该公司提升AI工具任务优化效能的研发方向。据该公司称，定于周二推出的Claude Sonnet 4.6模型能够执行多步骤计算机操作，例如填写网页表单后协调多个浏览器标签页的信息。 "该模型显然仍存在局限性——"【原文：Anthropic PBC is releasing a new artificial intelligence model that’s intended to be better at using people’s computers in increasingly complicated ways, building on the startup’s efforts to make AI tools more effective at streamlining tasks. Claude Sonnet 4.6, set to be rolled out on Tuesday, can carry out actions on a computer that require multiple steps, such as filling out web forms and then coordinating information across several browser tabs, the company said. “The model certainly still la】

item.title: 苹果加速研发智能眼镜、项链设备及摄像头AirPods，迎接人工智能时代
item.description: 苹果公司正加速开发三款新型可穿戴设备，作为其向人工智能驱动硬件转型的一部分。OpenAI和Meta Platforms公司也在积极布局该领域。【原文：Apple Inc. is accelerating development of three new wearable devices as part of a shift toward artificial intelligence-powered hardware, a category also being pursued by OpenAI and Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: ServiceNow高管取消股票出售计划以提振投资者信心
item.description: ServiceNow公司多位高管正取消其定期安排的股票出售计划，作为这家软件公司提振投资者信心的举措之一。【原文：Many of ServiceNow Inc.’s top executives are canceling their regularly scheduled stock sales as part of an effort by the software company to improve investor confidence.】

item.title: 石棉诉讼促使范德比尔特矿业公司申请破产
item.description: 范德比尔特矿业公司因现金流被大量诉讼案压垮而申请破产。这些诉讼指控该公司曾销售受石棉污染的产品。该公司主要开采工业产品所需的矿物原料。【原文：Vanderbilt Minerals, which mines materials used in industrial products, filed for bankruptcy after its cash flow was overwhelmed by an increase in lawsuits that accuse the company of once selling items contaminated by asbestos.】

item.title: 英国寻求欧盟盟友共同抵制法国"欧洲制造"倡议
item.description: 英国正游说德国、意大利和荷兰等国，共同抵制法国提出的严格贸易提案——该提案将禁止英国参与公共采购投标。【原文：The UK is lobbying countries including Germany, Italy and the Netherlands to push back against strict French trade proposals that would exclude Britain from participating in public procurement bids.】

item.title: 华尔街正评估沃什缩减美联储资产组合的选项
item.description: 华尔街策略师表示，美联储主席提名人凯文·沃什虽有多种途径缩减央行6.6万亿美元的资产负债表，但该过程将耗时且代价高昂。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair nominee Kevin Warsh has several paths toward reducing the central bank’s $6.6 trillion balance sheet but the process will be costly and lengthy, Wall Street strategists say.】

item.title: 凯西·瓦瑟曼的两起丑闻让太多人难以承受
item.description: 经纪人失去公司，正竭力保住洛杉矶奥运会的工作【原文：Talent agent has lost his company, is hanging on to his LA Olympics role】

item.title: 人工智能的故事不仅关乎技术
item.description: 决定谁能从颠覆中获胜。【原文：Deciding who wins from disruption.】

item.title: 慕尼黑再保险子公司将裁员1000人，因人工智能接管工作岗位
item.description: 慕尼黑再保险旗下主要保险业务部门Ergo计划在德国裁减约1000个岗位，部分原因是该公司加大了人工智能的应用力度。【原文：Munich Re’s primary insurance unit Ergo aims to cut about 1,000 positions in Germany, partly as a result of its increased use of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Palantir成为最新一家将总部迁至迈阿密的科技公司
item.description: 帕兰蒂尔科技公司宣布将总部从丹佛迁至迈阿密。随着该市领导层致力于将迈阿密打造为下一个硅谷，越来越多的科技企业正将目光投向这座佛罗里达城市。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. said it’s moved its headquarters to Miami from Denver as more tech firms seek to base themselves in the Florida city as the city’s civic leadership tries to turn the location into the next Silicon Valley.】

item.title: 量子公司Infleqtion在克莱因主导的SPAC交易后上市首日股价大涨
item.description: 因弗莱克顿公司周二在公开市场首日交易中股价上涨，此前该公司与由连续交易者迈克尔·克莱因支持的空白支票公司完成合并。【原文：Infleqtion Inc. shares climbed on Tuesday in their public debut after merging with a blank-check company sponsored by serial dealmaker Michael Klein.】

item.title: 互联网巨星经纪公司筹集7000万美元资金用于业务扩张
item.description: 夜间传媒公司（Night Media Inc.）是一家艺人经纪公司，旗下代理包括热门Twitch主播凯·塞纳特（Kai Cenat）在内的社交媒体名人。该公司近日完成7000万美元融资，将用于收购业务并拓展游戏、体育及音乐领域。【原文：Night Media Inc., the talent management firm that represents social media celebrities such as popular Twitch streamer Kai Cenat, has raised $70 million to fund acquisitions and expand into gaming, sports and music.】

item.title: 圭亚那计划"很快"启动新天然气项目以实现能源多元化
item.description: 圭亚那正在筹建第二条输气管道，将把深水油田开采的天然气输送至海岸地区，用于发电及其他工业发展。【原文：Guyana is preparing a second pipeline that will bring natural gas from its deepwater oil fields to the shore where it will be used for power and other industrial development.】

item.title: 人工智能代理OpenClaw将树莓派股票纳入投资者雷达
item.description: 科技爱好者对人工智能程序OpenClaw的狂热追捧，引发了树莓派控股公司股价的飙升。该公司生产的树莓派电脑堪称最简易的个人电脑之一。【原文：Tech enthusiasts’ craze for artificial intelligence program OpenClaw has sparked a blistering rally in shares of Raspberry Pi Holdings Plc, the company that makes one of the simplest forms of personal computers.】

item.title: 谷歌为美国数据中心锁定奥玛特地热公司
item.description: 字母表公司旗下的谷歌计划利用可再生能源企业奥玛特科技的地热能源，为其位于内华达州的数据中心群提供电力支持。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google plans to draw on geothermal power from renewable energy company Ormat Technologies to help fuel its fleet of data centers in Nevada.】
